name: Soda Pop
description:
I am making a game calling Soda Pop.  The main goal is kicking a soda pop bottle as high as you can and earning money from that. You can upgrade your bottle with the money you earned. You can change your bottle or you can change your kicker. all bottles have different features. More gliding or more liquid power.

I can hear that you say what is liquid power. When you kicking bottle, it explodes from bottom, it helps you to reduce gravity and helps you to go higher. But liquid can drain away. So you need more tank and more and different liquids to go higher 

If you liked my game you can donate to give me a hug. Peace!
